input.sentences: my family hired a guide to take us on a hike near the ocean .
we walked together through the meadow heading down the hill .
we stumbled together over a field strewn with boulders .
we rested after walking through the boulders and listened to the guide speak about how they got there .
finally | we walked down the rocky shore along the beach .
output.sentences: The group discussed safety before their nature walk.
The group saw some breathe taking views of lush green hills.
The rocky climb was a fun challenge for the group.
They had a nice lunch break to rest their tired feet.
Then they were all excited to go back to their fantastic hike.
